Name: Smile Pebble
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Skitty and Delcatty.  Swap a Skitty Fang and a Skitty Card for a Smile Pebble at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
